title: Appalachian Artisan Center
description: A hub for artists and craftspeople to showcase traditional Appalachian art and music.

title: Breaks Interstate Park
description: Known as the 'Grand Canyon of the South,' with stunning views and hiking trails.

title: Kentucky Reptile Zoo
description: A fascinating collection of snakes and reptiles, offering venom extractions for research.

title: Red River Gorge Geological Area
description: A natural playground of cliffs, arches, and hiking trails for outdoor enthusiasts.

title: Camp Nathanael
description: Christian-based camp offering year-round programs for youth and families.

title: Knott County Sportsplex
description: A large indoor facility with courts, turf, fitness center, and events.

title: SUP Kentucky
description: Guided stand-up paddleboarding tours through caves and scenic rivers.

title: Natural Tunnel State Park
description: A massive naturally formed cave tunnel, perfect for exploration and scenic views.
